stories.text:
Hey HN!

If you're fed up with how Ctrl+F works and can't seem to find what you need on websites, check out this chrome extension.

It performs simple searches locally. Advanced searches get sent to a secure backend for inference. Nothing is ever saved or recorded.

Let me know what you think.
stories.title: Show HN: Ctrl+F with Semantics

stories.text: I myself prefer open sourced app for better transparency, but the question is can there be an open sourced subscription based mobile apps? I have not seen any major subscription based mobile app which is also open sourced. Is this achievable if so how?
stories.title: Ask HN: Can there be open sourced subscriber based mobile apps?

stories.text: There seems to be a high concentration of rust jobs in Crypto. Why is rust so popular in Crypto? Any insights would be appreciated. Additionally, how does one go about finding Rust jobs not concentrated in crypto?
stories.title: Ask HN: Why is rust so popular among Crypto?
